Name: The Fabled Magnetic Cube Mechanics - II
Description: Mizhi has gone missing, and someone has tampered with the Mechanics. Qingshu, Mizhi's senior, is very worried.
QuestDesc: Mizhi has gone missing, and someone has tampered with the Mechanics. Qingshu, Mizhi's senior, is very worried.

Conditions.PreQuestName: The Fabled Magnetic Cube Mechanics - I

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Excuse me, you are {PlayerName}, right? You just said that Mi'zhi went into the pit?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No way. That is an abandoned pit, and it's precisely because there was an accident.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since it's so dangerous in the pit, the authority had those blocks set up at the entrance. Those controlled by the puzzles that you saw.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Originally, it was Mi'zhi and I who were responsible for the updates and maintenance of the puzzles. However, Mi'zhi developed a strange addction to the puzzles.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He spent all his days studying the possibilities of the combination of puzzles and went through all our books and all the mechanisms.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And all of a sudden, he started to talk about going down the pit, saying some ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics was there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew he would do anything for Magnetic Cube Mechanics, so I updated the puzzles with the ID recording function.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My intention was that I would be alarmed as soon as he puts his hands on the puzzles, but I didn't know he would ask another person, that is you, to solve the puzzles. What a shame!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sigh, we should go to the pit right away to look for him, but the puzzles...

Options.PlotLineKey: Didn't you say you were responsible for setting up the puzzles?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes I did, and I did set up the puzzles for yesterday, but the puzzles were somehow updated today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And no records were left at the backend. How mysterious...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though it is just a combination of old mechanisms, it became so difficult...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Actually, I saw the record you left yesterday, and I have to say your efficiency was really better than most engineers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, could you please solve the puzzles for me? Now you are the only one I can turn to to find Mi'zhi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you're unaware of some settings about the puzzles, I'll try and tell you as far as I know.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mi'zhi is gone... the puzzles are altered... what now, what now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So freezing... and a Ice Chrysalises?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It looks strange... Isn't it quivering?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, maybe I'm just too anxious and mistook something.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's just break it and look inside.
